sn21.11:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākappino yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
sn21.11:4.3: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahākappinaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn21.11:4.5: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ āgacchantaṃ odātakaṃ tanukaṃ tuṅganāsikan”ti?
sn21.11:4.8: Na ca sā samāpatti sulabharūpā yā tena bhikkhunā asamāpannapubbā.
sn21.11:4.9: Yassa catthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
